reviewText: I love it. A great season indeed. I love the new characters' like Dawn, Zoey, Piplup, Paul, Professor Rowan, Chimchar, Turtwig, etc. Funny in some ways, some ways in not. My other favorite series are "Save Me Lollipop.","Kodocha.","Negima! Magister Negi Magi.", "Love Hina.","Dragon Ball.","Dragon Ball Z.", "Bakugan Battle Brawlers.","Digimon Digital Monsters.", and most of all "Code Lyoko." If you're an anime fan I reccomend all these great series. I totally give this season five stars.
summary: A great season love the new characters, and new Pokemon
Title: Pokemon: Diamond and Pearl - Set Two, Vols. 3-4

reviewText: Im still a huge Pokemon fan , so I still purchase Pokemon products from the figures to the show and movies . Dont have any of the games so I mainly stay to the series and figure line of Pokemon and all their products are well made and amazing . Its Pokemon , its funa and still Lovable .Love Dawn shes one of my favorite characters so far that join Ash in his adventures .
Title: Pokemon: Diamond and Pearl - Set Two, Vols. 3-4

reviewText: You can't go wrong with Pokemon.  I am a parent, and even I find them witty and entertaining.  I find Pikachu adorable.
Title: Pokemon: Diamond and Pearl - Set Two, Vols. 3-4

reviewText: I love Pokémon and really enjoy watching lots of episodes.
Title: Pokemon: Diamond and Pearl - Set Two, Vols. 3-4

reviewText: It's a shame we are still the rest of this season and now A WHOLE other season behind from what is currently being aired here in America. Whenever we get the next volume(s), they need to still do "Adventures in Unova" then "Adventures in Unova and Beyond," which are still one whole season, then after that, we have the current season, "XY".Great series though and you will enjoy this volume! The "Black and White" series is really good!
summary: Finally we get the next volume!
Title: Pokemon: Diamond and Pearl - Set Two, Vols. 3-4
